title: It Takes One to Know One
description: Mundy is tasked with going to a small European state who's only source of income is its casino. Soviet infiltrators are attempting to steal the states crown jewels as a way of forcing the casino to close. Mundy must try and stop the robbery from happening

title: When Boy Meets Girl
description: Mundy needs all of his skills and talents to get a female defector safely out of enemy territory.

title: A Very Warm Reception
description: Mundy is tasked with infiltrating an embassy of a nation unfriendly to the United States. His job is to recover a list of enemy spies, unfortunately the Embassy staff know they are a high value target and have taken steps to stop an intrusion.

title: One Illegal Angel
description: Mundy steals a famous Da Vinci painting, and arranges a buyer. To maximize his profits he arranges for a counter fitter to produce a copy of the painting.

title: Totally by Design
description: Mundy must infiltrate a small Middle Eastern nation that is taking agricultural equipment supplied by the State department and reselling it for weapons. Once in, Mundy has to figure out a way the short circuit the deal.

title: When Thieves Fall In
description: Mundy has to find a way to steal a shipment of Baltic furs that have valuable information about ICBM designs sown into them.

title: A Spot of Trouble
description: Sensitive plans for a new weapon are stolen, and after the best agents in the government fail to locate them back Mundy is called. What seems like an easy job becomes complicated when it is realized the plans have been micro dotted

title: When Good Friends Get Together
description: The Prince of an Asian country is visiting the US. There are concerns that an assassination attempt could happen. Mundy is asked to join the prince's house hold and try and spot any potential threats

title: Birds of a Feather
description: An American spy is captured and put in prison. He's not slated for execution because the Botrovian authorities are convinced he knows the location of the documents he stole. Mundy is tasked with both rescuing the spy as well as recovering the documents.

title: To Steal a Battleship
description: A U.N diplomat is suspected of stealing NATO plans and trying to sell them. Mundy must search the man's extensive house and try to recover the documents.

title: Turnabout
description: Mundy is briefed to attempt to steal a new generation of optical lens from a Soviet science institute. At the last moment he is injured and Noah has to step into his shoes, with Mundys coaching.

title: The Radomir Miniature
description: While escaping across the border with his family, the ten year-old daughter of a scientist is captured, and being held against him for his return. Al Mundy to the rescue.

title: Locked in the Cradle of the Keep
description: When a family defects, their daughter is captured. If the family does not return, she will be raised by the state. Will Mundy be able to "steal" a child AND learn who is the traitor among the Resistance?

title: The Lay of the Land
description: Noah sends Al to break into a duchess's villa, not to steal her jewels, but the manuscript of her memoir.

title: The Bill Is in Committee
description: Al impersonates a magician and, accompanied by the magician's assistant, goes to a European principality to steal the negatives of compromising photos of a US Congressman, who is being blackmailed into supporting the country.

title: The Thingamabob Heist
description: Al must steal a sample of a revolutionary new type of jet fuel, the only trouble is he doesn't know what to look for.

title: Get Me to the Revolution on Time
The Packager
description: A millionaire blackmails Al into doing a job by threatening to expose his involvement with SIA.

title: A Case of Red Turnips
description: Mundy is ordered to attend a foreign film festival and steal the only copy of an avant-garde motion picture. The movie's director accidentally filmed eleven American spies making a drop at a location behind the Iron Curtain and if the film is premiered the agents will all soon be captured or dead.

title: A Matter of Grey Matter: Part 1
A Matter of Grey Matter: Part 2
Boom at the Top
description: The SIA orders Mundy to give a Washington, D.C., party in hopes he can nab the pickpocket who recently invaded a similar event in order to find a microdot. Complications arise when an acquaintance arrives with a bomb strapped to him in hopes that Mundy can disarm it.

title: The Funeral Is on Mundy
description: While on a mission to discredit a crack thief of an adversarial spy group, Mundy discovers the thief murdered during assignment and learns that he is an additional target of the other thief's mysterious assassin.

title: The Great Chess Gambit
description: A SAC bomber with three nuclear weapons aboard crashes. The bombs are recovered but the 3311 "Black Box", a failsafe device that receives the plane's "Go Order" direct from the President, is missing and being held for ransom. Al Mundy must outbid the Russians and retrieve the device.

title: Saturday Night in Venice
description: In Venice, Al is poisoned by a beautiful Soviet agent, and she tells him he has less than 48 hours to return the item he stole or he won't get the antidote.

title: Who'll Bid Two Million Dollars?
description: Al is sent to Porto Ercolle to recover stolen Plutonium, and is mistaken for someone named George.

title: The Great Casino Caper
description: Alex's latest assignment is to rob a casino that is passing counterfeit money. But he doesn't think he can do it on his own. He says he needs the help of the best thief of all time, his father. So he has to try and convince his father to do so.

title: The Blue, Blue Danube
description: Mundy is sent in to bring back William Dover, an SIA executive, so the SIA won't have to kill him. So, Al goes undercover as a ballet expert, seeking to break a catatonic Dover out of the hospital, but the bad guys are on to him.

title: The King of Thieves
description: On a romantic evening with Al, a US senator's daughter is kidnapped in Rome and Al is slugged, resulting in Al's foggy memory of the event.

title: The Old Who Came in from the Spy
description: Mundy and a retired British spy team up to smuggle a microdot out of an East Berlin museum.

title: Fortune City
description: Al and Mona, driving from Vegas to Los Angeles, are involved in a minor accident. When Al awakens with a minor head injury, he finds himself in an abandoned Old-West town and Mona is nowhere to be seen. Harvey, apparently the town's only resident, tries to convince Al he was alone in the car.

title: Situation Red
description: An Air Force Major, the chief of security, has an paranoid reaction to a prescription drug and takes over the Command Center during a bomber drill. Al is called in to extract him from the locked President's bunker before he starts World War III.

title: To Sing a Song of Murder
The Suzie Simone Caper
description: A Nazi diary reveals that a painting by Matisse has a hidden list of Nazi war criminals. Wally calls Al to steal the painting, which is protected by a sophisticated security system.

title: Beyond a Treasonable Doubt
description: Al is accused of treason, and he must determine who is behind the frame job while under a shoot-to-kill order.

title: Project X
description: Alex's latest assignment is to escort a scientist who is traveling with four other scientists to an important conference. It seems like the scientist asked for Alex to accompany him because he thinks that Alex's skills could be useful. But while they're in flight some of the scientists and the crew are being killed off. That's when a film is played that says they're going to try and save the planet for man destroying it. So Alex, the scientist and a flight attendant he knows tries to find out how they are doing this and how to stop them.
